title: Draw
body:
Draw 1
Keep 1

title: Hand
body: Maximum hand size: 4

title: Search
body:
Search 2
Mix with hand
Discard 2

title: Lead
body:
Play a card and place a cube on it.
You must have cubes on all dependent cards.
You must pay the existing card’s cost.

title: Follow
body:
Place a cube on an existing card.
You must have cubes on all dependent cards.
You must pay the existing card’s cost.

title: Draw
body:
Draw 1
Keep 1

title: Hand
body: +1 Hand Size

title: Search Boost
body:
For all Search actions:
+1 Keep

title: Lead
body:
Play a card and place a cube on it.
You must have cubes on all dependent cards.
You must pay the existing card’s cost.

title: Follow
body:
Place a cube on an existing card.
You must have cubes on all dependent cards.
You must pay the existing card’s cost.

title: Draw Boost
body:
For all draw actions:
+1 Draw
+1 Keep

title: Draw L3
body: Card Draw may come from Level 3

title: VP
body:
2 VP per token
Players may place multiple tokens here
Maximum 3 tokens total for all players
